name: The Gentle Giant v1.1
description:
The game we made for Ludum Dare 42 with theme: Running out of space.

The Gentle Giant tries to walk around, but not to hit stuff. The problem is that the available space gets smaller and smaller...

CONTROLS:

Spacebar or Left Mouse Button to lower your foot.

Try not to hit the friendly people and buildings but do hit the unfriendly robber....

Post Ludum Dare changes:

- Added SFX

- UI changes

- Tutorial screen

- Fixed some other bugs
